short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarizes web pages using OpenAI API

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Refurb AI is a powerful Google Chrome extension that transforms your reading experience into seamless social media engagement. It efficiently summarizes articles, extracting key insights, and generates concise, impactful posts tailored for the X Social Media Platform. Whether you're sharing knowledge or sparking conversations, Refurb is a tool that saves time, boosts productivity, and ensures your content stands out in the fast-paced world of social media.
